trans-unit.source: The time picker gives you a standardized way to let users pick a time value using touch, mouse, or keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: The time picker gives you a standardized way to let users pick a time value using touch, mouse, or keyboard input.

trans-unit.source: The time picker gives you a standardized way to let users pick a time value using touch, mouse, or keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: The time picker gives you a standardized way to let users pick a time value using touch, mouse, or keyboard input.

trans-unit.source: Use a time picker to let a user pick a single time value.
trans-unit.target: Use a time picker to let a user pick a single time value.

trans-unit.source: For more info about choosing the right control, see the [Date and time controls](date-and-time.md) article.
trans-unit.target: For more info about choosing the right control, see the [Date and time controls](date-and-time.md) article.

trans-unit.source: The entry point displays the chosen time, and when the user selects the entry point, a picker surface expands vertically from the middle for the user to make a selection.
trans-unit.target: The entry point displays the chosen time, and when the user selects the entry point, a picker surface expands vertically from the middle for the user to make a selection.

trans-unit.source: The time picker overlays other UI; it doesn't push other UI out of the way.
trans-unit.target: The time picker overlays other UI; it doesn't push other UI out of the way.

trans-unit.source: Example of the time picker expanding
trans-unit.target: Example of the time picker expanding

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to create a simple time picker with a header.
trans-unit.target: This example shows how to create a simple time picker with a header.

trans-unit.source: The resulting time picker looks like this:
trans-unit.target: The resulting time picker looks like this:

trans-unit.source: **Note**  For important info about date and time values, see [DateTime and Calendar values](date-and-time.md#datetime-and-calendar-values) in the *Date and time controls* article.
trans-unit.target: **Note**  For important info about date and time values, see [DateTime and Calendar values](date-and-time.md#datetime-and-calendar-values) in the *Date and time controls* article.

trans-unit.source: This article contains information that is specific to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps and Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: This article contains information that is specific to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps and Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.1 guidance, please download the [Windows 8.1 guidelines PDF](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=258743).
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.1 guidance, please download the [Windows 8.1 guidelines PDF](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=258743).
